text: Kim In-seo (; born 11 January 1984) is a South Korean actress, best known for her portrayal of Se-jung in the 2010 action thriller film I Saw the Devil.'I Saw the Devil': Heads will roll ==Works== She is best known for her portrayal of Se-jung in the action film I Saw the Devil, the film which was censored thrice to get an adult rating in South Korea. In the international cut of the film, her anal sex scene with Choi Min-sik, which exposed her naked butt was cut, while at the same time being retained in the Korean cut.I Saw the Devil: Comparisons (Unrated International Cut & Censored Korean Cut)I Saw the Devil: DVD Review She has also appeared in another Korean films like Children, Goodbye Mom and drama series like Flower Band, Vampire Prosecutor, Please Come Back, Soon-ae and The Musical. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:South Korean actresses Category:Living people Category:South Korean film actresses Category:South Korean television actresses Category:1984 births
title: Kim In-seo
